TopicTitle: i don't know if i can talk about off topic

Articles.Content:
Hello does i can talk about off topic very off topic things i have few thing i could talk about but don't if i can and can i ask a favor for the ksp moderators / devs : can i dm you on discord and can i get private talk ? (but i don't have a mic)

Edited July 25, 2021 by Neoks
adding more things

4 hours ago, Neoks said:

Hello does i can talk about off topic very off topic things i have few thing i could talk about but don't if i can and can i ask a favor for the ksp moderators / devs : can i dm you on discord and can i get private talk ? (but i don't have a mic)

I will send you a PM through the forum here. Watch your inbox for a notification.
can i talk about my bed? x) lol just to see if it this off topic
If you wanted to make a thread about your bed, this off-topic lounge would be the place for it.
does i need to make a new topic or keep this one?

@Vanamonde  @Neoks

Moderators will have of final say, but as long as it follows the forum rules, my guess is keep this one and rename the thread to something more descriptive such as "My Bed" so that it has a topic.

This one's fine. 

So. What is the issue with regard to your bed?
the issue is : i wanted a new bedding but it is very dificult to find and i get maybe one part of the bedding soon but i don't know why is so hard to find it , i hope i will get it

Where I am I have a choice of standard size beds. Because they are standardized I can usually find something to work with it.

 

I hope the bedding that you get is what you need. Are you ordering it from online? Or are you ordering it from a nearby store?
i ordered online but don't have the full bedding because it is rare so i will get one part
Ordering anything online can be very stressful sometimes. Hopefully the company is a good one. Good luck and let us know.
i will show  it or not ? because it a little bit  childish

Did they say how long it would take for certain? Or did they just give along "maybe 4 weeks" type of estimate?

 

Everywhere around the world deliveries of everything is very slow.

That seems like a good amount of time with the way everything is in the world today. Not to long.

 

I am curious about what it looks like now. If you like, you could link a picture of what you ordered here. The choice to do that is yours, of course.
i could but i prefer to wait and take my own picture because i don't know if the picture is protected and i can show it here
That's ok. Remember any real life picture you take with modern phones and cameras usually has data on it and it can be identifying or personal as well. So that is good thinking.
